definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: be free, loose (? usu. placed sub I., but connexion not obvious; cf. also NH Niph. free oneself, Hiph. = BH; perh. cp. Ar. natara rend a garment, break string (of bow), etc.);—

definitions.title: Hiph.
definitions.body: Impf. 3 ms. juss. [[יַתֵּר]] Job 6:9 sf. [[וַיַּתִּירֵהוּ]] Ps 105:20; Inf. abs. [[הַתֵּר]] Is 58:6; Pt. [[מַתִּיר]] Ps 146:7; —
unfasten, loosen, c. acc. rei; thongs of yoke Is 58:6 (‖[[פַּתֵּחַ]], [[תְּנַתֵָּקוּ]]).

set free, unbind c. acc. pers., prisoners Ps 105:20 (‖[[וַיְפַתְּחֵהוּ]]), Ps 146:7; fig. [[יַתֵּר יׇדוֹ]] Job 6:9 that he would let loose his hand and cut me off,—[[וַיַּתֵּר]] 2Sa 22:33 was poss. connected by Mass. with [[תּוּר]] (v. Comm.), but rd. [[וַיִּתֵּן]] (as ‖ Ps 18:33).
